definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This method can be easily generalized to relativistically phenomenological dynamical equation.
sentences.chinese: 这一方法易于推广到相对论性唯象动力学方程。

sentences.english: The relativistic classical scattering angular distributions are predicted which may be compared with experiments.
sentences.chinese: 相对论性经典理论预言的角分布可与实验比较。

sentences.english: The conservation laws of relativistic variable mass systems were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究相对论性变质量系统的守恒律。

sentences.english: The quantization of vortices has also been discussed in the relativistic superfluid in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 另外还讨论了相对论性超流体中的涡旋量子化。

pinyin: liang4 zi3 dian4 dong4 li4 xue2

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
